parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: The id of the template.

sectors.description: The sectors which the template is applicable to.

options.description: Optional key-value pairs with string keys

get.description: Find all templates which belong to the user's organization.

sectors.description: The sectors which the template is applicable to.

post.description: Creates a new item for the specified model. It uses the template of the model.

parameters.description: The id of the organization you are a member of.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: The id of the model. A item always belongs to a model.
